title: The Silver Shawl
description: A girl has disappeared...but did she go of her own accord?In turn-of-the-century Colorado, in the little town of Sour Springs, a young woman has disappeared from the boarding-house where she lives. Her distraught fianc√© is certain that she must have been kidnapped.The case takes a new turn when a city detective appears on the scene, looking for a woman who matches the description of the missing girl. Was Charity really kidnapped, or did she have a reason to flee?Mrs. Meade, a gentle but shrewd widow lady who lives across the hall in the boarding-house, feels that there is something wrong with the story of Charity's disappearance...but can she unravel the mystery before it is too late?If you're a fan of Agatha Christie's Miss Marple and Anna Katharine Green's Miss Amelia Butterworth, you'll love this quick trip back to the mountain West of the Edwardian era, with a shrewd lady sleuth to apply her wits to its puzzles.Get it today!
author: Elisabeth Grace Foley
